original_title: Scarred But Smarter: Life N Times of Drivin N Cryin
overview: What is rock & roll success? How is it measured? The story of Drivin N Cryin, a band that has enjoyed a loyal following for nearly 30 years in the southeast, but remains unknown to the rest of the world, is examined for clues and answers.
title: Scarred But Smarter: Life N Times of Drivin N Cryin
